name: Suspect Svchost Memory Asccess
description: Detects suspect access to svchost process memory such as that used by Invoke-Phantom to kill the winRM windows event logging service.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\WINDOWS\\System32\\svchost.exe AND winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:0x1F3FFF AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:*UNKNOWN*)`
